official_title: A bill to amend the Lacey Act Amendments of 1981.

summary.text: Amends the Lacey Act Amendments of 1981 to remove from the list of prohibited acts the possession of or commerce in mollusks, crustaceans, or arthropods (shellfish) in violation of foreign law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Lacey Act Amendments of 1981.
